name: @taskpilot/platform
description: TaskPilot Platform - Open Source Project Management with Conversational AI Task Execution
author: TaskPilot Team

scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.start:dist: npm run build:dist && shx cp .env dist/.env && cd dist && npm run prisma:generate && npm run start:prod
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces --if-present && shx rm -rf node_modules dist out .next
scripts.docker:build:dev: docker build -f Dockerfile.dev --build-arg BUILD_NUMBER=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) -t taskpilot:dev .
scripts.docker:build:prod: docker build -f Dockerfile.prod --build-arg BUILD_NUMBER=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) -t taskpilot:latest .
scripts.docker:push:dev: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -f Dockerfile.prod --build-arg BUILD_NUMBER=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) -t taskpilot/taskpilot:dev -t taskpilot/taskpilot:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-dev -t taskpilot/taskpilot:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) --push .
scripts.docker:push:stable: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -f Dockerfile.prod --build-arg BUILD_NUMBER=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) -t taskpilot/taskpilot:latest -t taskpilot/taskpilot:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") -t taskpilot/taskpilot:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) --push .
